Introduction

Quick Start provides a simple and fast way for users to proxy, secure and define their services. Using JSON, they can create and publish services to the API Gateway and apply proxy, security, routing, transformation and other logic to client requests.

Users have the option to choosing from a starter pack of available template logic or building their own blocks of custom logic using the Gateway's policy language to create custom encapsulated assertions.

To publish a service on your API Gateway and apply service and messaging logic:

  1. Create a JSON file containing your service description. (See below for schema and description.)
  2. Apply this JSON file to your API Gateway by submitting an HTTP PUT request with the JSON content to http://localhost:8080/quickstart/1.0 using your Gateway's administrator username and password.
  3. Use your service.

Description of Top Level Containers and Schema

Each JSON file describes a single service. Different services must be defined in different files.

A service consists of a name, a URI (service endpoint), and a number of HTTP access methods, as well as an ordered list of "policy assertions" (features that protect, secure, or enhance your API).

The complete list of available assertions is below, but here is a sample service and the JSON schema for the services in general.

Sample JSON file for creating a Service

{
  "Service": {
    "name": "SomeService",
    "gatewayUri": "/MyService3",
    "httpMethods": [ "get", "put" ],
    "policy": [
      {
        "Cors" : {}
      },
      {
        "RateLimit" : {
          "maxRequestsPerSecond": 250,
          "hardLimit": true,
          "counterName": "RateLimit-${request.clientId}-b0938b7ad6ff"
        }
      },
      {
        "RouteHttp" : {
          "targetUrl" : "http://localhost:8080/foo",
          "httpMethod" : "GET"
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

JSON Schema for Services

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "Service": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "name": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "gatewayUri": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "httpMethods": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "enum": [ "get", "put", "post", "delete", "patch", "head", "options", "other" ]
          }
        },
        "policy": {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "additionalProperties" : false,
      "required": [ "name", "gatewayUri", "httpMethods", "policy"]
    }
  },
  "required": [ "Service" ]
}
